creator: mongermd@yahoo.com
text:
I have found the situation where a Regular Expression Extractor is not 
executed based on its position in the test plan. 

SOAP/XML-RPC Request
=> Regular Expression Extractor
HTTP Request
=> Regular Expression Extractor

The above order will execute the first extractor, but not the second one. 

HTTP Request
=> Regular Expression Extractor
SOAP/XML-RPC Request
=> Regular Expression Extractor

When the two sampler nodes are reversed, both extractors execute.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: Can you attach a simple test plan, and the corresponding jmeter.log please?
